application.description: The most popular and one of the best free Mail Clients out there.

application.name: SeaMonkey
application.description: Mozilla Suite is alive. This is the one and only Browser, Mail, Chat, and Composer bundle you will ever need.

application.name: Mozilla ActiveX Control
application.description: Essential Component to get ReactOS Explorer's and other applications' Internet Browsing feature running.

application.name: Off By One Browser
application.regname: The Off By One Web Browser
application.description: The Off By One Browser is a very small and fast web browser with full HTML 3.2 support.

application.name: mIRC
application.description: The most popular client for the Internet Relay Chat (IRC).

application.name: Samba TNG
application.description: This tool allows you to access your Windows shared folders/printers with ReactOS.

application.name: Miranda IM
application.description: Open source multiprotocol instant messaging application - May not work completely.

application.name: Putty
application.description: A free SSH, Telnet, rlogin, and raw TCP client.

application.name: Abiword
application.description: Word processor.

application.name: OpenOffice
application.description: THE Open Source Office Suite.

application.name: IrfanView
application.description: Viewer for all kinds of graphics/audio files/video files.

application.name: IrfanView Plugins
application.description: Additional Plugins for supporting more file types.

application.name: TuxPaint
application.description: An Open Source bitmap graphics editor geared towards young children.

application.name: zeckensack's glide wrapper
application.description: glidewrapper needed to run Diablo 2 on ReactOS.

application.name: ReactOS Build Environment
application.description: Allows you to build the ReactOS Source. For more instructions see ReactOS wiki.

application.name: MinGW
application.description: A Port of the GNU toolchain with GCC, GDB, GNU make, etc.

application.name: FreeBASIC
application.description: Open Source BASIC Compiler. The BASIC syntax is compatible to QBASIC.

application.name: ScummVM
application.description: SamNMax, Day of Tentacle, etc on ReactOS

application.name: Diablo 2 Shareware
application.description: Diablo 2 Shareware. zeckensack's glide wrapper is req. to run it.

application.name: Tile World
application.description: Nice Clone of Chip's Challenge originally made for the Atari Lynx. Includes free CCLP2 Graphics Pack, so you dont need the copyrighted Original.

application.name: OpenTTD
application.description: Open Source clone of the "Transport Tycoon Deluxe" game engine. You need a copy of Transport Tycoon.

application.name: LBreakout2
application.description: Breakout Clone using SDL libs.

application.name: LGeneral
application.description: Panzer General Clone using SDL libs.

application.name: LMarbles
application.description: Atomix Clone using SDL libs.

application.name: WinBoard
application.description: WinBoard is a graphical chessboard for the Windows/ReactOS that can serve as a user interface for GNU Chess, Crafty, and other chess engines, for the Internet Chess Servers, and for electronic mail correspondence chess.

application.name: 7-Zip
application.description: Utility to create and open 7zip, zip, tar, rar and other archive files.

application.name: uTorrent
application.description: Small and fast BitTorrent Client.

application.name: Audio Grabber
application.description: A very good CD Ripper/Audio File Converter.

application.name: Simple Direct Media Layer (SDL) Runtime
application.description: Needed for many Open Source Games to run. You need 7-Zip or a similar Utility to extract it.

application.name: DOSBox
application.description: DOSBox is a DOS emulator.
